sentence.Network_en: Interestingly, it is not clear which solution the prime minister favors.
sentence.Network_cn: 耐人寻味的是，现在还不清楚首相支持哪个解决方案。

sentence.Network_en: Interestingly enough, a few weeks later, Benjamin remarried.
sentence.Network_cn: 有意思的是，几个星期以后，本杰明又结婚了。

sentence.Network_en: Most interestingly, they are demanding that a national working party on crimes against women and children be established.
sentence.Network_cn: 最令人关注的是，他们要求针对侵害妇女和儿童的犯罪成立全国专案组。

list.abs: on teaching knowledge and learning interestingly ., 论知识教学与兴趣学习.

entry.tran: 有趣的是;令人关注的是;想不到的是
entry.def: You use interestingly to introduce a piece of information that you think is interesting or unexpected.

example.ex: Interestingly enough, a few weeks later, Benjamin remarried...
example.tran: 有意思的是,几个星期以后,本杰明又结婚了。

example.ex: Interestingly, it is not clear which solution the prime minister favors.
example.tran: 耐人寻味的是,现在还不清楚首相支持哪个解决方案。

sentences.sentence: "when he ceases to be just interestingly neurotic and...gets locked up"- Time
